channel.title: Skillcape emotes
channel.description: how do u make a skill cape emote i search for threads does not say please tell me here how to make skill cape emote using silab capes like str capes...

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Yeah i have one, Hold on i’ll add.

Rapidshare:http://rapidshare.com/files/86644925/GFX_List.txt.html

There ya go.

It’s a old one, But all i could get ahold of on short notice

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Grova, what source are you using?

looks like Czar to me, but just a guess.

Redo the Things i told him to Do,

You might have missed something.

Edit: I don’t think you removed Everything:

You should be seeing:

case 161: if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("kqueen"); //made by Musicmad441 } break;

Delete it all so it looks like:

case 161:

Bare

Then put:

case 161: //cape capeEmote(); customCommand("skill c"); break;

Hope this helped.

Custom command does nothing, I added that awhile ago When i was just messing around i think you
Can remove it if you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Actually, remove what i told you to do, i’ll go into more information now.
Go to client.java, search:

public void restorePot() {

After the last }

updateRequired = true;

Ignore summoning, you can take that out if you want, These are with ‘silab’ Id’s.

You can arrange Gfx’s to your liking.

look for:

case 161:

Then replace that case with:

//cape capeEmote(); customCommand("skill c"); break;

Tell me if that help at all?

Ignore summoning, you can take that out if you want, These are with ‘silab’ Id’s.

You can arrange Gfx’s to your liking.

look for:

case 166:

Then replace that case with:

//cape capeEmote(); customCommand("skill c"); break;

Sorry i whiped this up in 3 mins, if it’s hard to understand

Read full topic
